topic: Create a video about matrix multiplication

scenes.title: Introduction to Matrix Multiplication
scenes.narration_summary: Introduce matrices as mathematical objects and explain why matrix multiplication is different from element-wise operations

scenes.title: Mathematical Definition
scenes.narration_summary: Explain the row-column dot product rule and dimensional requirements for matrix multiplication

scenes.title: Step-by-Step Computation
scenes.narration_summary: Walk through a complete matrix multiplication example with numerical values
animations: Build result matrix cell by cell

scenes.title: Geometric Interpretation
scenes.narration_summary: Show how matrix multiplication transforms vectors and represents linear transformations

scenes.title: Key Properties and Applications
scenes.narration_summary: Cover non-commutativity, associativity, and real-world applications in computer graphics and data science

scenes.title: Summary and Key Takeaways
scenes.narration_summary: Recap the core concepts, computation method, and importance of matrix multiplication

errors: Phase final_render failed: moviepy import error: No module named 'moviepy.editor' (resolved: switched verification to ffprobe; re-render succeeded)

history.action: Generated comprehensive video plan for matrix multiplication with 6 scenes covering introduction through recap
history.details: Created plan.json with 600 estimated words across 240 seconds, targeting linear algebra students

Plan shows logical narrative flow and reasonable timing estimates. Scene 4 (Geometric Interpretation) includes 3D coordinate system animations; 3D is allowed when it improves clarity/engagement, and this is appropriate here.
All validation checks passed: logical flow, feasible animations, reasonable timing, no high-risk issues. Advancing to narration phase.

history.action: Generated narration scripts and voice configuration
history.details: Created narration_script.py with conversational scripts for all 6 scenes, and voice_config.py with locked ElevenLabs settings for Big D's cloned voice.
Generated Manim scene file for introduction with title, matrix examples, and multiplication symbol animations
Generated Manim scene file for mathematical definition with matrix dimensions, row-column highlighting, and dot product animation
Generated Manim scene file for step-by-step computation with 2x3 and 3x2 matrix example, cell-by-cell calculation with color-coded row-column interactions
Generated Manim scene file for geometric interpretation with vector transformations, matrix visualizations, and grid elements
Generated Manim scene file for key properties and applications with equations demonstrating non-commutativity and associativity
Generated Manim scene file for summary and key takeaways with key formula highlights and final matrix transformation demo. All scenes now built; advancing to final_render phase.

This project was created before the migration to Qwen voice clone (Feb 2026). Historical references to 'ElevenLabs' in the history array reflect the voice service that was used at the time. The project is complete and serves as a historical reference. All new projects use local Qwen voice clone.
